*** This message is generated by an autoresponder at cometdesign.com ***

Your email message to adressee@cometdesign.com was deleted because there is no one here by that name!!!

Email sent to invalid addresses on our domain are no longer allowed due to excessive amounts of SPAM messages that took over our Inboxes.

The good news is that we are now SPAM free. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

Go to www.cometdesign.com for contact info and call us to get the proper email address for the person you are trying to reach.

Regards,

Cometdesign.com Webmaster
